title: Two Nominations Sent to the Senate â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
October 23, 2020
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:Joseph Dawson, III, of South Carolina, to be United States District Judge for the District of South Carolina, vice Terry L. Wooten, retired.Stephen Andrew Kubiatowski, of Kentucky, to be a Judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a term of fifteen years, vice Thomas Craig Wheeler, term expiring.
